name: UFO Rescue
description:
Earbeard Games is proud to present:
UFO Rescue! The mothership has crash landed on Earth. The survivors have scattered across the landscape. Pilot your scout ship to rescue as many of them as you can - but be careful! The humans don't take kindly to uninvited visitors...

Credits:
  • Sarah Ferguson - Game Designer
  • Cora Stephens - Art Designer
  • Eric Berzins - Lead Audio Designer
  • Jose Jimenez Filomeno - Composer and Sound Designer
